(Recklessa should probably be bleeding, since the disks he fired has razor
sharp spikes along the sides and it was spinning really fast.)

Klant fired at the missiles. He missed. Klant tried to move one way, but
decided to move the other way, seeing as how if he moves to the right, he
would be hit by the other missile. He ran to the left, but he didn't think
he could make it. He tried to decide which way to run. He took too long, and
a missile hits him, exploding. Klant falls over in the explosion, and crawls
on the ground. He realizes his damage, and crawls toward Torca. In his first
battle, and already he was embarrased like this...
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Monday, December 18, 2000 11:37 AM
Subject: Re: The Battle Ends, and the Carnage Begins

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Recklessa yelps in surprise as several shots hit her in the back. She
spins around, pointing her missile launcher at Klant and firing two
missiles.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
